Package budgettracker

Class Goal

java.lang.Object
budgettracker.Goal
public class Goal extends Object
------------------------------------------------------------- Deals with the functionality of the goals in the program - checks if a goal has expired, it it has been broken, getters for goalCatagory, goalprice, goaltime, getGoalrepeate setters for start date, end date, price file Goal.js date:11/17/2021
